name: Trashlands-DD46
description:
Trashlands first demo!  This is an entry for Demo Day 46. 
The game isn't quite ready for a demo, but I figured I'd upload it in its current state so you guys can see it.  

All of the art in the game was generated by Dall-e mini.  All the characters, all the textures, all the trees and the buildings and the fish etc. everything. 

Controls!

WASD - moves
SHIFT - sprints
SPACE - rolls / doges.  (normally rolls, changes to doge jump when you have target)
TAB - targets enemy while in combat, hold tab to untarget enemy. 
LEFT CLICK - Minor attack
RIGHT CLICK - Heavy attack. 
ENTER - open menu.  
E - Action Key (Plays piano, enter building, talk to NPC, Start Fishing, etc)

There is still a lot of work to be done, I thought I would have combat done in time for this Demo Day but I decided to stop worrying about it and just upload. 


I didn't test the compiled version before uploading

looks like there are a few bugs I didn't know about,  for some reason no matter what you pick to look like in the demo it forces you to look like the "random" card.
